mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Profile (curatorId, curatorName, title, introduction) VALUES (#{curatorId}, #{curatorName}, #{title}, #{introduction});
mapper.select: select profile.profileId, profile.curatorId, profile.curatorName, profile.title, profile.introduction, career.company, career.companyTitle, academic.name, academic.major from Profile left join Career on profile.profileId = career.profileId left join Academic on profile.profileId = career.profileId where profile.curatorId = #{curatorId};
select exists(select 1 from Profile where curatorId = #{curatorId});
